entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
